mapper.select: select * from chatroom where display=1 order by chatroomId desc
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (title, userId, position, champion, memo) values(#{title}, #{userId},#{position}, #{champ}, #{memo})
mapper.select: select title from chatroom where chatroomId= #{roomId}
mapper.insert: insert into chatmember(chatmember, title, roomId) values(#{memberId}, #{title}, #{chatroomId})
mapper.select: select chatmember from chatmember where roomId=#{roomId}
mapper.delete: delete from chatmember where roomId=#{chatroomId} and chatmember=#{memberId}
